ai-snp5.18:1.1_0: “That’s what the Buddha said. Shrines are shrines, fondness and displayed when asked a question.
ai-snp5.18:1.2_0: If, knowing the meaning and the teaching and practices accordingly, they’d practice accordingly, they’d practice in line with the teaching.
ai-snp5.18:1.3_0: ‘They are said inclusively: these things are a term for this exposition of the teaching.’
ai-snp5.18:3.1_0: the two: Todeyya, and Kappa, Todeyya,
ai-snp5.18:5.1_0: The Buddha gave them a progress.
ai-snp5.18:5.4_0: the sage relinquished the brahmin Todeyya,
ai-snp5.18:6.1_0: They are satisfied with the eyes,
ai-snp5.18:6.2_0: the Kinsman of the Sun, so skilled in means,
ai-snp5.18:6.4_0: this man of such splendid wisdom,
ai-snp5.18:7.2_0: as it was taught by the Buddha,
ai-snp5.18:8.3_0: This is the path to the beyond,
ai-snp5.18:8.4_0: therefore it is called The Way to the Beyond.
